title: Service Disruption: Train Delays between Outram Park and Raffles Place

title_translations.zh-Hans: 服务中断：欧南园站至莱佛士坊站之间列车延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Perkhidmatan: Kelewatan Kereta Api antara Outram Park dan Raffles Place
title_translations.ta: சேவை இடையூறு: அவுட்ரம் பார்க் மற்றும் ராஃபிள்ஸ் பிளேஸ் இடையே ரயில் தாமதங்கள்

updates.text: UPDATE:Trains between Outram Park and Raffles Place are running well in both directions.
Trains between Outram Park and Raffles Place are travelling slower in both directions due to track fault.
